#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;

int main ()
{
	int tc;
	cin >> tc;

	while (tc--)
	{
		int n, temp;
		cin >> n;

	vector < int > team;
		for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
		{
			cin >> temp;
			team.push_back(temp);
			team[i]=team[i]*3;
		}

		for (int i=0; i<+n; i++)
		{
			cin >> temp;
			team[i] = team[i] + temp;
		}

		int ans = 0;
		ans = *max_element(team.begin(),team.end());
		cout << ans << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
